name: Piano Wheel
description:
Play awesome piano songs by rolling the ball to hit the black and white balls. Avoid the red balls. Don’t miss any black or white balls.

Game features:
- Play the best piano songs ever written
- Playing piano songs has never been easier
- Simple design inspired by cylinder music box
- High quality sound
- Different piano songs to satisfy every taste
- Easy to play, everyone can play the Piano Wheel
- One handed gameplay
- Finger sliding challenge
- Endless gameplay after reaching 3 stars by clicking "Continue": play faster and faster for high score
- Complete with others on leaderboards
- Share your score with friends

Good luck!
